MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL32 and LL34 postcode areas of Conwy and Penmaenmawr, affecting properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  6:50PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive network investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  11:05PM on 27th March 2021.
